findings.title: An assignment to undeclared variable
findings.description: The contract attempts to assign a value to a 'depositFeePerc' variable, which has not previously been declared.

findings.title: Highly permissive owner and admin access
findings.description: The visibility of state variables are not labeled, allowing highly permissive owner and admin access.

findings.title: Insufficient funds and early withdrawal of funds from Anchor
findings.description: The contract allows redeeming funds from Anchor for fees an unlimited number of times before they are paid. Funds from Anchor will be withdrawn prematurely.

findings.title: Redundant functions
findings.description: The “getUserBalance”, “getUserBalanceInUSD” functions do the same. The “getAllPoolInUSD” function returns the result of the “getAllPool” function calling.

findings.title: Exchange Rate Defining
findings.description: The owner or admin defines the exchange rate for UST/aUST, which may lead to incorrect rates.

findings.title: Flashloan Attack
findings.description: When working with exchange rates, they should be received from a trusted source and not be vulnerable to short-term rate changes that can be achieved by using flash loans. Oracles should be used.

findings.title: Token Supply manipulation
findings.description: Tokens can be minted only according to rules specified in a whitepaper or any other documentation provided by the customer.
